content: {"name": "Bebashi Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Call +1 (215) 769-3561 ext 100 to make an appointment\n* First time visitors can take advantage of free food (groceries), but for next time, a referral from church or government agency indicating your household number, annual household income, and address.\n* Due to Philadelphia\u2019s plastic bag ban that is currently in effect, clients are being asked to bring a reusable bag.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.bebashi.org/food-and-support/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4101 Woodland Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "University City", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19104", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9478975, "longitude": -75.2060836}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 769-3561", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring referral Letter and/or Income or Assistance Letter"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
